DMUReviewHdr.Title: Review
DMUReviewHdr.ShortHelp: Creates a review linked to the loaded context. If several contexts are loaded in the session, select one in the Review dialog box.
DMUReviewHdr.LongHelp: In the Review dialog box, select a context (if required) and enter a name and description for the review.
DMUReviewMarkupHdr.Title: 마크업
DMUReviewMarkupHdr.LongHelp: 검토 대화 상자에서, 마크업 이름과 설명을 입력합니다.
DMUAddCheckHdr.Title: Check
DMUAddCheckHdr.LongHelp: Creates a Check with a default name and state.
DMUAddHighlightHdr.Title: Highlight
DMUAddHighlightHdr.LongHelp: Create a Highlight from the current Slide with a default name and rating.
DMURemoveAllHdr.Title: Close
DMURemoveAllHdr.ShortHelp: Close all the objects from the view.
DMUMarkCommentProcessedHdr.Title: Mark as Processed
DMUMarkCommentWithdrawnHdr.Title: Mark as Withdrawn
DMUUnMarkCommentHdr.Title: Clear Status
